content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace 1 at position (-14.0, -49.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (-12.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-13.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -45.5), (-9.5, -44.5), and (-14.5, -43.5) for moving items between furnaces and chests
- Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -46.5) for storing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (-11.5, -44.5) for additional storage
- Transport Belts connecting various components for item movement

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 23.5)
- Steam Engine at position (-3.5, 23.5)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group for water transport
- Small Electric Pole at position (-4.5, 25.5) for power distribution

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Blockage Errors
- Ensure that inserters have a clear path to both source and destination entities to prevent blockages. Check for items on the ground that may obstruct inserter operations.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Verify that the source entities have items available for inserters to pick up. Ensure that production lines are adequately supplied with raw materials.

### Errors When Inserting Items Without Inventory
- Before attempting to insert items into an entity, confirm that the required items are present in your inventory to avoid operation failures.
